title: RBI Governor Das again flags a big worry for banks as retail money moves out to alternate investment routes
description: RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das cautioned that rising retail investments in alternative routes like mutual funds could lead to structural liquidity issues for banks, as deposits decline. SBI's latest report shows credit growth among Indian banks surpassing deposit growth, with credit increasing by 14% and deposits by 11.3% year-on-year.
